bug.author: JackRen88
bug.summary: WARNING: SpawnActor: failed with: rpc::rpc_error during call
bug.description: Hello,everyone! I want to see where the origin of the world in carla isï¼Œso I modify vehicle's spawn point as carla.Transform() in the manual.py,when I run the script,showing as follow: WARNING: SpawnActor: failed with: rpc::rpc_error during call,and resulting in pygame not starting properly.How should I solve it?

comments.comment: The origin of the Carla Map is inside the fountain of the roundabout. At (0, 0, 0) you cannot spawn a vehicle. Try (0, 0, 20) and the vehicle will fall down from above or choose a location near to (0, 0) which is at ground level.

The usual cause of this message is a collision at the spawn point, it can be because there is another, a building, or any other obstacle. The main problem here is the lack of information, the spawn function actually returns a string with the cause of failure but there is a problem retrieving this message on the client-side. I'll add this issue to our backlog to track this problem.
